page.title: 06 Wilby Flower Festival
page.content: The Flower Festival is held once a year in the parish church. Every year there is a different theme on which the displays are based.They range from Â£Fishing', to Â£St. Francis', from Â£Towns',to Â£Hymns'. This year the theme is Â£Books of the Bible' & the festival is to be held on June 17th & 18th. Any one can enter an arrangement & there is a prize for the best entry. The belfry is open & people can go up into the church tower & ring the bells if they get permission from the vicar. There are stalls selling tea,coffee & food. There is also a gym and dance display in the school next door. The festival is a real village affair and everyone takes part.
